QuestData.Title: Military Breakthrough
QuestData.Description: We've lost contact with Sergeant Dynamo, stationed at the next ridge to the north of the central minefield. They were probably overrun.$B$BHe had our last SFG. Go over there and get it back. Clear out any naga that have broken through while you're there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Warlord Krellian and recover the SFG.
QuestData.RewardText: Quick work there, recruit.$B$BShe's a beaut, isn't she? Assembled her myself. I've got special plans for this baby.
